page.title: 14THE COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION
page.content: In Hutton Henry we do not have any sports facilities.The nearest sports centre is in Peterlee,which is four and a half miles away.So in September 1983 a Public Meeting was held to organise a Community Association.A committee was elected to organise groups,activities and fund raising for the village people.The present officials are president Mrs.L.Berry, Chairman_Mr.R.Emmerson,Treasure Mr.G Hilton and Secretary is Mrs.A Vevers Several sections have been formed _the Youth Club which is run by Mr.Wilson and Mr.Truswell.A badminton group is organised by Mr. Hilton and Mr. Armstrong.The Ladies Club is planning a Children's playscheme for the school holidays. A monthly magazine is produced by Mrs.Vevers and Mrs.Hilton. An annual Summer Fayre and disco are held in a marquee on the common.
